Company Announcements

# Lobo EV Technologies Unveils New Investor Website

[![TipRanks Auto-Generated Newsdesk](https://blog.tipranks.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/Newsdesk.png)TipRanks Auto-Generated Newsdesk](/news/author/tipranksnewsdesk)

A+A-

Lobo EV Technologies Ltd. (**[LOBO](https://www.tipranks.com/stocks/lobo/stock-analysis)**) has released an update.

## Don't Miss our Black Friday Offers:

  * Unlock your investing potential with TipRanks Premium - [Now At 40% OFF!](https://lp.tipranks.com/black-friday-2024-premium2/?coupon=bfcm24p40&sku=3256820&llf=campaign-article-promo&timer=on&custom18=article)
  * Make smarter investments with [weekly expert stock picks from the Smart Investor Newsletter](https://lp.tipranks.com/black-friday-2024-smartinvestor/?coupon=bfcm24si40per&sku=3483380&llf=campaign-article-promo&timer=on&custom18=article)



Lobo EV Technologies Ltd., a player in the electric vehicle sector, has just rolled out a new investor-focused website, aiming to enhance communication and provide timely updates on company affairs. The website is accessible at https://loboev.io/, where investors and interested parties can stay informed on the latest developments. This initiative reflects Lobo EV Technologies’ commitment to transparency and shareholder engagement.

For further insights into LOBO stock, check out TipRanks’ [Stock Analysis page](https://www.tipranks.com/stocks/lobo/stock-analysis).

## Trending Articles:

  * [ZMI, TBAL: 2 Canadian Balanced ETFs to Shield Your Returns](/news/zmi-tbal-2-canadian-balanced-etfs-to-shield-your-returns)
  * [Class Action Lawsuit Against Paragon 28, Inc. (NYSE:FNA)](/news/class-action-lawsuit-against-paragon-28-inc-nysefna)

![LOBO EV sees 80% year-over-year revenue growth for 2024](https://blog.tipranks.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/thefly_750x400.png)

The Fly

# LOBO EV sees 80% year-over-year revenue growth for 2024

[![TheFly](https://blog.tipranks.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/Asset-4-160x160.png)TheFly](/news/author/thefly)

A+A-

LOBO EV Technologies announced revenue guidance for the full year of 2024, projecting an 80% increase compared to the previous year, driven by recent capacity expansion, new product launches, and new market entries. “We are optimistic about our revenue prospects for 2024,” said Huajian Xu, CEO of [LOBO](https://www.tipranks.com/stocks/lobo). “Our investments in expanding our capabilities and our focus on innovation put us in a strong position to meet evolving customer needs across the globe. We also expect improving margins in the second half of the year as we gain operational efficiencies from our expanded production capacity and higher economies of scale.” Key Drivers of Projected Growth: Capacity Expansion: LOBO has scaled up its production facilities to accommodate increasing demand. Product Development: Introduction of new products expected to contribute significantly to revenue growth. Market Expansion: Entry into new markets, particularly in Eastern Europe and Latin America, creating opportunities with top-tier customers.

## Don't Miss our Black Friday Offers:

  * Unlock your investing potential with TipRanks Premium - [Now At 40% OFF!](https://lp.tipranks.com/black-friday-2024-premium2/?coupon=bfcm24p40&sku=3256820&llf=campaign-article-promo&timer=on&custom18=article)
  * Make smarter investments with [weekly expert stock picks from the Smart Investor Newsletter](https://lp.tipranks.com/black-friday-2024-smartinvestor/?coupon=bfcm24si40per&sku=3483380&llf=campaign-article-promo&timer=on&custom18=article)

The Fly

# LOBO EV announces it completed a record number of shipments in September

[![TheFly](https://blog.tipranks.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/Asset-4-160x160.png)TheFly](/news/author/thefly)

A+A-

LOBO EV Technologies announced that the company completed a record number of shipments in September 2024, driven by the successful introduction of new products and an expanding overseas customer base. The volume of deliveries in September 2024 increased approximately 108% compared to September 2023, with about 2,800 units of e-bikes and 700 units of tricycles sold. The strong demand for [LOBO](https://www.tipranks.com/stocks/lobo)‘s latest products, combined with expanding overseas customer base, has contributed to this achievement.

![3 Penny Stocks to Watch Now, 11/29/24](https://blog.tipranks.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/shutterstock_405739450-1-750x406.jpg)

Market News

# 3 Penny Stocks to Watch Now, 11/29/24

[![Sheryl Sheth](https://blog.tipranks.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Sheryl-Sheth-160x160.jpg)Sheryl Sheth](/news/author/sheryl-sheth)

A+A-

VCI Global Limited, T Stamp Inc., and Outlook Therapeutics are the 3 Penny Stocks to watch on November 29, 2024, based on [TipRanks’ Penny Stock Screener tool](https://www.tipranks.com/screener/penny-stocks). Penny stocks are defined as stocks that trade at or below $5 per share and have a market capitalization of below $300 million.

## Don't Miss our Black Friday Offers:

  * Unlock your investing potential with TipRanks Premium - [Now At 40% OFF!](https://lp.tipranks.com/black-friday-2024-premium2/?coupon=bfcm24p40&sku=3256820&llf=campaign-article-promo&timer=on&custom18=article)
  * Make smarter investments with [weekly expert stock picks from the Smart Investor Newsletter](https://lp.tipranks.com/black-friday-2024-smartinvestor/?coupon=bfcm24si40per&sku=3483380&llf=campaign-article-promo&timer=on&custom18=article)



The Penny Stock Screener helps investors scan stocks based on numerous parameters, including Sector, Price Target Upside, Smart Score, Analyst Consensus, Dollar Volume, and Price Change.

We leveraged the tool to pick the top three penny stocks with the highest Dollar Volume as of the close on November 27, 2024 (November 28 was a holiday on account of Thanksgiving Day). Simply put, Dollar Volume is the number of shares traded on a particular day multiplied by the day’s share price.

[![](https://blog.tipranks.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/image-1029.png)](https://www.tipranks.com/screener/penny-stocks)

**VCI Global Limited** [(VCIG)](https://www.tipranks.com/stocks/vcig) – Malaysia-based VCI Global is a holding company. Its subsidiaries are engaged in consulting, fintech, artificial intelligence (AI), robotics, and cybersecurity solutions.

On November 27, VCIG had a Dollar Volume of $1.06 billion, while its stock price jumped by 129.05% in reaction to positive news on the previous day. On November 26, VCIG announced the receipt of a conditional letter of award for $24 million from Hexatoff Group Sdn. Bhd. for its proposed data center project in Enstek City, Malaysia.

**T Stamp Inc. Class A** [(IDAI)](https://www.tipranks.com/stocks/idai) – Trust Stamp offers AI-powered identity services and biometrics. Its solutions are used in various industries, including finance, regulatory compliance, government, real estate, and communications. 

IDAI had a Dollar Volume of $314.50 million on November 27, with its stock price surging by over 130%. There was no specific news for IDAI stock recently, however shares have been on an uptrend since November 26, skyrocketing over 366%.

**Outlook Therapeutics** [(OTLK)](https://www.tipranks.com/stocks/otlk) – Outlook Therapeutics is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, focused on developing treatments for the preservation of vision.

OTLK’s Dollar Volume stood at $105.87 million on November 27, while its stock price plunged by 65.2%. The same day, OTLK announced preliminary top-line results from its NORSE EIGHT clinical trial, which did not meet the pre-specified non-inferiority endpoint at week 8 set forth in the special protocol assessment (SPA) with the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA). The drug is being developed for the treatment of AMD (age-related macular degeneration) and other retinal diseases.

To find more penny stocks like these, you can take a look at [TipRanks’ Penny Stock Screener tool](https://www.tipranks.com/screener/penny-stocks). It shows a list of all penny stocks, their price movement, and other vital data.
